content: DX 6 Powder-actuated nailer kit Fully automatic powder-actuated nailer – wall and formwork kit ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Direct fastening tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Maximum versatility – kit includes 10-fastener magazine and exchangeable guides for specific fasteners One-step energy level setting – expanded on-tool power adjustment means you can use a single cartridge color for many fastenings Higher productivity – automatic piston return and cartridge advancement equip you to work up to 5 times faster than alternative fastening methods Easy to operate – precise control helps to deliver consistent, more accurate fastening On-board display – shows when your nailer needs cleaning or maintenance Applications Fastening wood and metal sheet to concrete, sand-lime block masonry or steel Fastening 2x4s to concrete Attaching drainage foils and membranes to concrete or CMU block Fastening perimeter wall track, deflection or slip clips to concrete and steel Installing Hilti formstop elements on concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: Dimensions (LxWxH): 19.1 x 2.7 x 7.5 in Weight: 8 lb. Fastener Intake: Collated Technical Data | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 19.1 x 2.7 x 7.5 in | Weight | 8 lb | Fastener Intake | Collated | Fastener length range | 0.51 - 2.83 in | Automatic piston return | Yes | Bluetooth | No | Hilti Connect | No | Power (max.) | 335 J | Power regulation | Yes | Piston type | X-6-5-P8 ### ITEMS- 3806307 - DX 6 KIT TOOL(5 PACK) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 5x DX 6_01 NFC Basic unit - 5x X-6-5-P8 Piston assy - 5x X-6-MX 72_01 Nail magazine assy - 5x X-6-SH Scaffold hook assy - 5x X-6-F8_01 Fastener guide assy - 5x DX 6 Cleaning kit - 5x DX 460 / 462 / 5 / 6 Tool case - 2156156 - Powder-actuated tool DX 6 Kit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DX 6_01 NFC Basic unit - 1x X-6-5-P8 Piston assy - 1x X-6-MX 72_01 Nail magazine assy - 1x X-6-SH Scaffold hook assy - 1x X-6-F8_01 Fastener guide assy - 1x DX 6 Cleaning kit - 1x DX 460 / 462 / 5 / 6 Tool case
